msg: Added an introduction section about event sources.

author: oheger
msg: Now all sources for events in Commons Configuration can be accessed in a

author: oheger
msg: ConfigurationBuilder now extends the EventSource interface.
This caused some adaptations in BasicConfigurationBuilder and derived classes.
BuilderConfigurationWrapperFactory had to be slightly modified again.

author: oheger
msg: The method signature is now in-line with other event listener methods.

author: oheger
msg: BasicConfigurationBuilder now support the EventListenerProvider interface.
If a parameters object passed to the configure() method implements this
interface, the listeners it contains are added to the configuration builder.
